name: CalEndar
description:
When a new task pops up, you must place it on the calendar accourding to the details provided in the email messages.

You can access your inbox by clicking on the "Email" screen at the bottom of your screen.

Make sure not to make a mistake, as you will get fired!

NOTE ON CRITICAL BUG:

The intention was that when given a time range like 10:00-11:30, the appointment could start at 10:00, 10:30, 11:00, or 11:30. However, there is a bug where you can't actually put an appointment on 11:30 or else you'll lose. Basically you can put an appointment anywhere in the given time range except for exactly on the end of the range. Also, you can't place anything on 5:30pm.

NOTE TO RUN ON WINDOWS:

We made a mistake and changed the name of the exe file after exporting so now it doesn't run. To run it, you have to change the name of the Calendar.exe file to berkeley_game_jam_2022.exe
